Class NeptunesPride

io.github.eutro.neptunespride.NeptunesPride

  • Method Details

    • fetch

      public static ScanningData fetch​(String gameId, String apiKey) throws IOException, NPApiException, com.google.gson.JsonParseException
      Fetch and deserialize the scanning data for a game, as returned by the API.

      This method fetches the raw data and deserializes it using Gson, or throws an exception if the API returned an error.

      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game, as a string.
      apiKey - The API code generated in the game's options.
      Returns:
      The scanning data fetched and deserialized from the API.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an IO exception occurs fetching the data.
      NPApiException - If the API returns an error.
      com.google.gson.JsonParseException - If the API did not return valid JSON.
      See Also:
      fetchRaw(String, String), getGson()

    • fetchRaw

      public static com.google.gson.JsonElement fetchRaw​(String gameId, String apiKey) throws IOException, com.google.gson.JsonParseException
      Fetch the JSON data for a game, as returned by the API.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game, as a string.
      apiKey - The API code generated in the game's options.
      Returns:
      The JSON the API returned.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an IO exception occurs fetching the data.
      com.google.gson.JsonParseException - If the API did not return valid JSON.
      See Also:
      fetch(String, String)

    • getGson

      public static com.google.gson.Gson getGson()
      Get the Gson instance used to deserialize the JSON data.
      Returns:
      The Gson instance that is used to deserialize the incoming data.
      See Also:
      fetch(String, String)

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args) throws IOException
      Pretty-print the data from the API, taking a game ID and an API key.
      Parameters:
      args - The program arguments, an array of two strings, the game ID and the API key.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the API couldn't be polled.
